verses.roman:
tataḥ prasenajit tasmāt
takṣako bhavitā punaḥ
tato bṛhadbalo yas tu
pitrā te samare hataḥ

synonyms: tataḥ—from Viśvabāhu; prasenajit—a son named Prasenajit was born; tasmāt—from him; takṣakaḥ—Takṣaka; bhavitā—would take birth; punaḥ—again; tataḥ—from him; bṛhadbalaḥ—a son named Bṛhadbala; yaḥ—he who; tu—but; pitrā—by father; te—your; samare—in the fight; hataḥ—killed.
translation: From Viśvabāhu came a son named Prasenajit, from Prasenajit came Takṣaka, and from Takṣaka came Bṛhadbala, who was killed in a fight by your father.
